title: The Boys on the Bus - 1987 Edmonton Oilers Xvid
description:
this is a re-upload - sorry for the inconvenience to those stranded on the first Xvid of this movie

Documentary
Xvid

A year in the life of hockey's greatest team. Candid interviews and footage of greats like Wayne Gretzky, Grant Fuhr, Jari Jurri, Glen Anderson, Mark Messier and more.

Bonus music video: "That Moment in Time"

(ISO is available for this documentary. If desired, please leave a comment requesting so and I will upload it here.) 

FYI, ISO are the files that let you make an exact duplicate of the DVD so that it plays like the original DVD, different from an Xvid that can only play on your computer and as a VCD with poor quality if played in a DVD player.

IMDB Info
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0303793/
